description:
Do you live a gluten free lifestyle? Do you love to travel? Then this app is for you! Eating gluten free and eating out is always a challenge. It's even harder when traveling to a foreign country. Getting a restaurant to prepare food for you that is gluten free is a real challenge. That's where this app comes in. The restaurant cards in this app explain to restaurant staff that you cannot eat food with gluten in 50 languages! Version 2 changes the interface to be easier to navigate. To find a particular restaurant just start typing and it will filter the list as you type!

These cards are provided by CeliacTravel.com free of charge. If you appreciate the cards and like the app feel free to donate to CeliacTravel.com and/or to K2 Tech Service for the time and effort put into providing this useful tool. Feel free to visit our forum at k2techservice.com/forum/ if you have any questions or comments.
